tool.name: ClassViz
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool takes a JSON file, in Software Vizualization Interchange Format (**SVIF**) file format, as input and visualizes a knowledge-based system representation of the code.
-----
**Remarks**
- The job fails if the input file is not a JSON file, or it is not in SVIF file format. - Delete the job once done to kill the server that hosts the tool.
